text: Betsy Jochum "Sockum" (born February 8, 1921) is a former American baseball player. She played as an outfielder and pitcher. She played from 1943 to 1948 in the All-American Girls Professional Baseball League. She was listed at , . She batted and threw right-handed. Jochum played for the South Bend Blue Sox during her whole career. Jochum was born in Cincinnati, Ohio.Smithsonian National Museum of American History â€“ Sports: Breaking Records, Breaking Barriers Exhibition She was raised in South Bend, Indiana. Jochum turned 100 years old on February 8, 2021 and is still alive at age 103 in 2024. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:Living people Category:American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Indiana Category:Sportspeople from Cincinnati Category:People from South Bend, Indiana
title: Betsy Jochum
